text: Bog posylayet konchinu lyudyam ili togda, kogda vremya umeret' im, ili vo vremya sna ikh, kogda im yeshche ne umirat' by: i odnikh, o kotorykh sostoyalos' opredeleniye, podvergayet smerti, a drugikh osvobozhdayet ot neye do opredelennogo sroka. V etom yest' znameniya dlya lyudey razmyshlyayushchikh
